data.title: G V Wright pays injured nurse
data.meta_description: G V Wright, a former Fianna Fail TD, has agreed an out of court settlement with a nurse he knocked down while drink driving in 2003. A High Court action was struck out after Wright and Anne Butler
data.text:
G V Wright, a former Fianna Fail TD, has agreed an out of court settlement with a nurse he knocked down while drink driving in 2003. A High Court action was struck out after Wright and Anne Butler, whose leg was badly damaged in the incident, agreed an undisclosed settlement.

Butler's solicitor confirmed last week that the case had been resolved, but declined to comment on the size of the award. Neither Wright nor his solicitor returned calls. Although the size of the award is not known, Wright is likely to have paid Butler a six-figure sum, including damages and legal costs.

Butler's case against the former TD, named as Thomas Wright in court papers, was struck out in October after neither party attended a
